languages.text: "Главное, знай меру. Некоторые желания сложнее исполнить, чем избавиться от их авторов".
"You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."
languages.original_text: "Главное, знай меру. Некоторые желания сложнее исполнить, чем избавиться от их авторов".

traits.locale_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."
"You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."
"You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."
"You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

languages.text: “你最好别太得意忘形。如果有些愿望实在是太难实现，把提出愿望的人干掉，说不定还会更简单些。”
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: “你最好别太得意忘形。如果有些愿望实在是太难实现，把提出愿望的人干掉，说不定还会更简单些。”

languages.text: 「あまり調子に乗るな。頼んできた相手を処分したほうが簡単なくらい、叶えるのが難しい願いもあるのだから」
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: 「あまり調子に乗るな。頼んできた相手を処分したほうが簡単なくらい、叶えるのが難しい願いもあるのだから」

languages.text: «No se deje llevar. Algunos deseos son tan difíciles de cumplir que resulta más fácil eliminar a quien los pide».
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: «No se deje llevar. Algunos deseos son tan difíciles de cumplir que resulta más fácil eliminar a quien los pide».

languages.text: « Ne vous emballez pas trop. Un souhait peut se révéler si difficile à réaliser qu'il est plus simple de se débarrasser de la personne qui l'a formulé. »
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous emballez pas trop. Un souhait peut se révéler si difficile à réaliser qu'il est plus simple de se débarrasser de la personne qui l'a formulé. »

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht hinreißen. Manche Wünsche lassen sich so schwer erfüllen, dass es einfacher ist, den Wünschenden einfach loszuwerden."
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht hinreißen. Manche Wünsche lassen sich so schwer erfüllen, dass es einfacher ist, den Wünschenden einfach loszuwerden."

languages.text: "Çok da abartmamalısın. Bazı dilekleri yerine getirmek, dileyenden kurtulmaktan daha zordur."
languages.original_text: "You should not get carried away. Some wishes are so difficult to fulfil that it is simpler to dispose of the asker."

traits.locale_text: "Çok da abartmamalısın. Bazı dilekleri yerine getirmek, dileyenden kurtulmaktan daha zordur."
